objects.name: start
objects.doc: Initialize the game server.

objects.name: handle_call
objects.doc: Check whether a Moongate.SocketOrigin is authenticated.

objects.name: handle_cast
objects.doc: Create a new account with the given params if we're allowed.

objects.name: condense_pool_member
objects.doc:
Remove any special attributes from a pool member's
  keyword list, allowing it to be compared to items
  within a pool's members list.

objects.name: handle_call
objects.doc: Clean up

objects.name: handle_cast
objects.doc: Accept an incoming message.

objects.name: handle_message
objects.doc: Handle an incoming, trusted message.

objects.name: init
objects.doc: Prepare the events listener supervisor.

objects.name: parse
objects.doc: Validate and parse an incoming packet.

objects.name: sync
objects.doc:
This function takes a Moongate.SyncEvent which contains a list
  of keys and a list of lists containing values mapped to those
  keys. It generates a string representing these keys and the
  members of the collection.

objects.name: handle_call
objects.doc:
Synchronously call a function defined on the pool module,
  replying with the result.

objects.name: handle_cast
objects.doc: Handle a pool member mutation event.

objects.name: handle_info
objects.doc:
Given a callback and a number of milliseconds, cascade that
  callback as it is defined on the pool module on a timer
  set to the interval provided.

objects.name: init
objects.doc: Prepare the pools listener supervisor.

objects.name: init
objects.doc: Prepare the HTTP server supervisor.

objects.name: greeting
objects.doc: A greeting message, output when the server is started.

objects.name: origin
objects.doc:
Given a Moongate.SocketOrigin, return the appropriate
  string to use to represent that origin.

objects.name: pretty
objects.doc: Format and output a colorized ANSI string.

objects.name: take
objects.doc:
This is called when a socket message is received by a
  client and the server has no defined way of dealing with
  it. This is overriden by the Moongate.Scopes.Events within
  the world's server/scopes directory.

objects.name: on_load
objects.doc:
This is called when the game server first loads. This is
  overriden by the Moongate.Scopes.Start within the world's
  server/scopes directory.

objects.name: init
objects.doc: Prepare the HTTP server supervisor.

objects.name: start_link
objects.doc: Listen for incoming socket messages on a port.

objects.name: init
objects.doc: Prepare the sockets listener supervisor.

objects.name: init
objects.doc: Prepare the sockets listener supervisor.

objects.name: init
objects.doc: Prepare the sockets listener supervisor.

objects.name: handle_cast
objects.doc:
Receive a message from an event listener and if the origin on the
  event is qualified, call the callback defined on the stage
  module.

objects.name: initialize_pool
objects.doc: Initialize one pool.

objects.name: initialize_pools
objects.doc: Initialize all pools.

objects.name: init
objects.doc: Prepare the events listener supervisor.

objects.name: handle_call
objects.doc: Spawn a new child within the requested supervisor.

objects.name: handle_cast
objects.doc: Cast on all children of a supervisor.

objects.name: init
objects.doc: Prepare the supervision tree.
